Author: RumpledBunny
Text: Someone recently asked me why the fear of passing out or being hospitalized again didn't scare me enough to stop me from restricting. I had to explain that when you're this messed up all the scary bad things just feel like success.

Author: algorthin
Text: For me passing out was from dehydration, and it was the turning point where I started seeking recovery because it was soooo constant. Even if that's not you, consider picking up some pedialyte. Advanced care is only 70 calories per liter, and any type is 70-100 calories per liter. It has fewer calories per ounce than most vegetables. Especially if you're going to be in a situation where passing out would be very dangerous, it's great to keep on hand.
